entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
